column.valueComputed: (select id from ${schemaPrefix}apartado where orden = 3 and bloque_id = (select id from ${schemaPrefix}bloque where orden = 1 and formulario_id = (select id from ${schemaPrefix}formulario where codigo='${formularioRestrospectivaCode}')))

column.name: apartado_id
column.valueComputed: (select id from ${schemaPrefix}apartado where orden = 4 and bloque_id = (select id from ${schemaPrefix}bloque where orden = 1 and formulario_id = (select id from ${schemaPrefix}formulario where codigo='${formularioRestrospectivaCode}')))

column.name: tipo_documento_id
column.valueComputed: (select id from ${schemaPrefix}tipo_documento where formulario_id = (select id from ${schemaPrefix}formulario where codigo='${formularioRestrospectivaCode}') AND codigo = 'ADICIONAL')

column.name: formulario_id
column.valueComputed: (select id from ${schemaPrefix}formulario where codigo='${formularioRestrospectivaCode}')

column.name: bloque_id
column.valueComputed: (select id from ${schemaPrefix}bloque where orden = '0' and formulario_id is null)

column.name: apartado_id
column.valueComputed: (select id from ${schemaPrefix}apartado where orden = 1 and bloque_id = (select id from ${schemaPrefix}bloque where orden = '0' and formulario_id is null))

column.name: formly_id
column.valueComputed: (select id from ${schemaPrefix}formly where nombre = 'CHECKLIST')

column.name: value_
column.value: E: Responsible for the on site supervision of the welfare and care of the animals

column.name: value_
column.value: Handling of animals or performance of procedures
